content.query:
-- =============================================================================
-- OpenHack MDWH
-- Azure Synapse Analytics Demo
-- https://github.com/aessing/demo-azuresynapse
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Developer.......: Andre Essing (https://www.andre-essing.de/)
--                                (https://github.com/aessing)
--                                (https://twitter.com/aessing)
--                                (https://www.linkedin.com/in/aessing/)
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- THIS CODE AND INFORMATION ARE PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND,
-- EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE IMPLIED
-- WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND/OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
-- =============================================================================

-- Check out the distinct values
-- SELECT DISTINCT [Genre] FROM [ext].[Catalog]

-- TRUNCATE TABLE [dbo].[DimCategories]

-- Load table
DECLARE @MaxSK TINYINT;
SELECT @MaxSK = ISNULL(MAX(MovieCategorySK), 0) FROM [dbo].[DimCategories]

INSERT INTO [dbo].[DimCategories] (
	MovieCategorySK,
	MovieCategoryDescription
)
SELECT * FROM (
	SELECT 
		@MaxSK + ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ExternalTable.Genre) AS MovieCategorySK,
		ExternalTable.Genre AS MovieCategoryDescription
	FROM (
		SELECT
			DISTINCT [Genre]
		FROM
			[ext].[Catalog]
	) ExternalTable
) CleansedTable
WHERE CleansedTable.MovieCategoryDescription NOT IN (SELECT MovieCategoryDescription FROM [dbo].[DimCategories])

-- Check Load
-- SELECT * FROM [dbo].[DimCategories]
